The Lost Dawn.name: The Lost Dawn
The Lost Dawn.description:
A Deity (Lathander) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Bring sunlight back to a cursed village.

Situation. In the woods outside the village of Feather Falls, the Night Hag Mother Gloam has trapped a fragment of Lathander’s power within a stone obelisk. The village is surrounded by unnatural gloom. Crops are failing, and despair hangs over the people.

Hook. Dawnbringer Fenna (Medium Priest Acolyte), a human devotee of Lathander, has received a vision directing her to a grove near the village. She offers 300 GP to any party willing to secure the site and bring back the sun.

Coven Magic.name: 集会魔法
Coven Magic.description: 在 30 尺内有至少两个鬼婆盟友的情况下，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分，使用法术的原本施法时间，并使用智力作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]）：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{卜筮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{寻获魔宠}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{鉴定术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{物件定位术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{探知术}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{隐形仆役}。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 必须完成一次长休后才能再次用此特质施展其所选的法术。

Augury.name: 卜筮术
Augury.description:
你从异界存在处获得一个预示，关乎你计划在未来 30 分钟内采取的一系列行动的结果。DM 从预示表中选择一个预示。

预示对应结果将是…
吉好的
凶坏的
吉凶并存既好又坏
无既不好也不坏

该法术不会考虑可能改变结果的情况，例如其他法术。

如果你在完成一次长休前多次施展此法术，则第一次施法后每次施法都有累计 25% 的几率得不到答案。

materials.value: 绘有标记的短棒、骨头、卡片、或类似的预言道具，价值 25+GP

Find Familiar.name: 寻获魔宠
Find Familiar.description:
你获得一只为你服务的魔宠，魔宠精魄可以采用下述你选择的动物形态之一：蝙蝠、猫、青蛙、鹰、蜥蜴、章鱼、猫头鹰、老鼠、渡鸦、蜘蛛、鼬，你也可以选择其他挑战等级为 0 的野兽作为魔宠的形态。魔宠出现在施法距离内一处未被占据的空间，虽然有着所选的生物属性数据，但其生物种类为天族，妖精或邪魔（由你选择）而非野兽。你的魔宠可脱离你独立行动，不过它会一直遵循你的命令行事。

心灵连接。 你的魔宠距你 100 尺内期间，你可以与其进行心灵交流。此外，你还可以用一个附赠动作将自己的视觉和听觉切换到魔宠的感官，并一持续至你下一回合开始。在此期间，你同时享有该魔宠自身的特殊感官。

最后，当你施展施法距离为触碰的法术时，你的魔宠可以帮你传递这道触碰法术。此时你的魔宠必须距你 100 尺内，且其必须在你施展这道法术时执行一个反应将其传递。

战斗。 魔宠是你和你盟友的盟友。战斗时，它为自己骰先攻，并在自己回合里行动。魔宠无法攻击，但是它能如常执行其他动作。

魔宠的消失。 当魔宠生命值降至 0 点时，它会消失。它会在你再次施展此法术后重新出现。你可以用一个魔法动作，暂时解散你的魔宠，将其送入一个口袋位面。你也可以选择永久解散它。暂时解散时，你可以用一个魔法动作使其重新出现于距你 30 尺内任意未占空间中。当魔宠生命值归 0 或消失进入了口袋位面时，它都会将自己穿着或携带的任何物品留在自己曾占据的空间中。

独一无二。 你在同一时间不能拥有多于一只魔宠。如果你在已拥有一只魔宠期间施展此法术，作为替代，你会使其采用一个新的符合条件的形态。

materials.value: 价值 10+GP 的焚香，作为法术耗材

Identify.name: 鉴定术
Identify.description:
你指定一个物件，并在施法过程中一直与其保持接触。如果该物件是魔法物品或其他附有魔力的物件，则你将知晓其属性和使用方式，以及了解是否需要与之同调。若它是充能物品则你将得知它现存的可用次数。你还可以发现是否有法术正影响该物件，以及可能存在的法术效应具体来自哪项法术。如果目标由法术所创，则你将知晓具体来自哪项法术。

如果你施法过程中一直接触的是一生物，则你将知晓其是否受法术影响，及产生影响的法术效应具体来自哪些法术。

Locate Object.name: 物件定位术
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役
Unseen Servant.description:
该法术创造出一个隐形、无心智、无定形的中型 力场。你可以在法术终止前命令它进行简单的工作。该仆役被创造出来后出现在施法距离内一处未占空间的地面上。其 AC 为 10，具有 1 生命值，力量为 2，且不能攻击。若仆从的生命值降至 0，则法术终止。

在每个自己回合内以一个附赠动作 ，你可以精神性的对仆役下达一道命令，使其移动至多 15 尺并与一个物件进行互动。仆役可以做人类能做到的简单工作，例如拿取东西、打扫卫生、修补东西、叠衣服、点火、上菜、倒饮料等。一旦你下达了命令，仆役就会尽全力去进行任务直至完成任务，并在此后等待你的下一个命令。

如果你命令仆役做一件需要它离开你身边 60 尺的工作，则法术终止。

命令术command命令术command

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定中具有优势。

Soul Bag.name: 灵魂袋
Soul Bag.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]有一只灵魂袋。只要持握或携带灵魂袋，[[lookup @name lowercase]]就能够使用其噩梦缠身动作。

灵魂袋具有AC 15、HP 20、具有对所有伤害的抗性。当灵魂袋生命值降至0时，其化作尘埃。若灵魂袋被摧毁，所有被[[lookup @name lowercase]]装在里面的灵魂都会被释放。[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在 7 日后创造一个新的灵魂袋。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile} (level 4 version)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPhantasmal]{Phantasmal Killer}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only)

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为小型或中型的类人生物，或变回其真实形态。除体型外，其各形态下游戏数据均相同。[[lookup @name lowercase]]着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Nightmare Haunting.name: 噩梦缠身
Nightmare Haunting.description:
若[[lookup @name lowercase]]身处以太位面，其施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。只有[[lookup @name lowercase]]能作为法术的信使，并且目标必须是一名[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的身处物质位面的生物。若目标处于法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]效应下或身处法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]中，法术失败并被浪费。

若目标因此次托梦术受到伤害，目标的生命值上限减少等于此次伤害的数值。其灵魂会被困入[[lookup @name lowercase]]的灵魂袋中，并且直至目标的灵魂被释放，其无法被复活。

Dream.name: 托梦术
Dream.description:
你指定一名你知道且与你同处一个存在位面的生物。你或一名被你触碰的自愿生物将作为信使进入出神状态。该状态下，信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使以可怕的形象出现。但此时信使只能提供不超过十个单词的信息，随后目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标便无法从休息中获益，并在其醒来时受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: 出神状态
Trance State.description: 信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Magic Missile.name: 魔法飞弹
Magic Missile.description:
你创造三枚由魔法力场形成的闪光飞镖，并让每发飞镖袭向施法距离内你能看见的指定生物。每发飞镖对目标造成 1d4 + 1 的力场伤害。所有飞镖将同时袭向目标，而你还可以指定它们击中同一个目标或是分别击中几个目标。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，该法术就会多制造出一支飞镖。

[[2 + @item.level]]{环阶 [[lookup @item.level]] 飞弹}

Phantasmal Killer.name: 魅影杀手
Phantasmal Killer.description:
你指定施法距离内一名你可见的生物，窥探其噩梦，依此创造一道只有目标能看见的幻象。目标生物进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标受到 4d10 点心灵伤害，且在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。豁免成功，则目标只受一半伤害，法术终止。

法术持续时间内，目标在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比四环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Fears Manifested.name: 陷入噩梦
Fears Manifested.description:
在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

法术持续时间内，你在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

materials.value: 一根与一个存在位面调谐的价值 250+GP 的分叉金属棒

affects.special: 你和至多八名自愿的生物

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]] 施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]

Divine Aid.name: 至圣援护
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description: You ward a creature within range. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack roll or a damaging spell must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] or either choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesn't protect the warded creature from areas of effect. The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack roll, casts a spell, or deals damage.

Warded.name: 庇护
Warded.description:
在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=wis format=long]]豁免，若豁免失败，该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道法术，或是造成任何伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Cultist Fanatic.name: 邪教狂信者
Cultist Fanatic.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol (Varies)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}

Cultists

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.VICfYukXoYkWJ1yn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Cultist Fanatic

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.DHw4tAz06WzLz07b caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +4）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{光亮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术}

2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{定身人类}

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

z817Et9IPt6qHawH.name: 灵体武器
z817Et9IPt6qHawH.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Life Drain.name: 吸取生命
Life Drain.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标为生物，目标的生命值上限减少等于其受到伤害的数值。

Empyrean Iota.description:
至高天

Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定中具有优势。

Otherworldly Strike.name: 异界打击
Otherworldly Strike.description:

命中： [[/damage average]]伤害（由 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 选择）

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]（以动作施展）

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次级复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

myomZEnYjGO4ePQh.name: 治愈真言
myomZEnYjGO4ePQh.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Smoke Mephit.description:
魔蝠

敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合结束。

Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。中毒期间，你无法恢复生命值。

Cinder Breath.name: 燃烬吐息
Cinder Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合结束。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至烟魔蝠的下一回合结束。

Avoidance.name: 神避
Avoidance.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到一个允许其进行豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，其豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。其无法在失能期间使用此特质。

Displacement.name: 移影换位
Displacement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 投射的魔法幻象使自己看上去位于真实位置附近的另一个位置，导致所有对其进行的攻击检定具有劣势。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 失能期间该特质失效。

Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmTentacle000000]] 攻击。

Rend.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Demonic Restoration.name: 恶魔复苏
Demonic Restoration.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 于无底深渊之外死去，其身躯会化为灰烬，并立即在无底深渊某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Light Sensitivity.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处明亮光照，其属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处微光光照或黑暗，其执行 &Reference[Hide] 动作。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Deity (Lathander) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Bring sunlight back to a cursed village.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifHauntedGrove0]{Haunted Grove}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.2NfcLkFNy14ja9fl]{The Lost Dawn}

Situation. In the woods outside the village of Feather Falls, the @UUID[Actor.aifNightHag00000]{Night Hag} Mother Gloam has trapped a fragment of Lathander’s power within a stone obelisk. The village is surrounded by unnatural gloom. Crops are failing, and despair hangs over the people.

Hook. Dawnbringer Fenna (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifPriestAcolyte]{Priest Acolyte}), a human devotee of Lathander, has received a vision directing her to a grove near the village. She offers [[/award 300GP]] to any party willing to secure the site and bring back the sun.

Encounters

Use @UUID[Scene.aifHauntedGrove0]{the map} below for these encounters. The interior of the grove is in &Reference[Darkness]. Light sources that would create Bright Light create Dim Light instead.

Entering the Grove. The entrance to the grove is guarded by three @UUID[Actor.aifCultistFanati]{Cultist Fanatics} and a @UUID[Actor.aifSpecter000000]{Specter}.

Obelisk of Night. A stone obelisk marked with runes stands in the central clearing of the grove. Mother Gloam has trapped an @UUID[Actor.aifEmpyreanIota0]{Empyrean Iota} within the obelisk. To free it, the characters must collect three runestones from elsewhere in the grove and place them into recesses on the obelisk’s surface. When all three runestones are in their places, the obelisk shatters, the empyrean bursts free, and dawn comes to the village.

If the characters haven’t yet fought Mother Gloam, she confronts them when they bring the third runestone to the clearing.

Gathering Runestones. The three @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.items.Item.aifRunestone0000]{runestones}—smooth, flat tiles shaped like the central obelisk and each carved with a single rune—are placed on withered stumps at different places along the paths surrounding the central clearing. One is in the southwest corner where the path bends sharply. The second is in the southeast corner, where the path rises along a small hillside and comes to an end. The third is on the east side, where a smaller clearing is lined with vibrant purple fungus.

While the characters explore the paths looking for the runestones, roll on the table below, rerolling duplicates.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.tables.RollTable.aifEncGatheringR rollable classes="caption-top" resultLabel="Encounter" caption=false]

Conclusion. If the obelisk is destroyed, Mother Gloam retreats, swearing an eternal vendetta against the characters. The iota selects one character, lands in their hand, and permanently transforms into a sentient @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgGemOfBrightne]{Gem of Brightness}.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.DBa39o02c3fKsUKG caption=false]

The Tenebrous Stone.name: The Tenebrous Stone
The Tenebrous Stone.description:
A Deity (Ilmater) Adventure for

Level 3 Characters

Thwart cultists devoted to Orcus.

Situation. A cult devoted to Orcus has hidden a demonic stone in a basalt quarry in the village of Helmsdale in Damara. The stone gives off waves of magical fear and despair, overwhelming workers and transforming some into Undead. A monk of the Yellow Rose monastery, Brother Trasig, investigated the quarry but has never returned.

Hook. Helmsdale’s town elders, distraught over Trasig’s disappearance, offer 300 GP for the characters to investigate the quarry and learn his fate. They believe the quarry is cursed and have no knowledge of the stone hidden in its depths.

Life Drain.name: 吸取生命

Life Drain.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=FA4Mt9cXsYfHDDcs]] feet.

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium or Small Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except its Fly Speed is available only in its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] ，当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Deity (Ilmater) Adventure for

Level 3 Characters

Thwart cultists devoted to Orcus.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifQuarry0000000]{Quarry}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.2fVEdRbCqrftyGAc]{The Tenebrous Stone}

Situation. A cult devoted to Orcus has hidden a demonic stone in a basalt quarry in the village of Helmsdale in Damara. The stone gives off waves of magical fear and despair, overwhelming workers and transforming some into Undead. A monk of the Yellow Rose monastery, Brother Trasig, investigated the quarry but has never returned.

Hook. Helmsdale’s town elders, distraught over Trasig’s disappearance, offer [[/award 300GP]] for the characters to investigate the quarry and learn his fate. They believe the quarry is cursed and have no knowledge of the stone hidden in its depths.

Encounters

Use the @UUID[Scene.aifQuarry0000000]{quarry map} for this adventure. The adventure consists of these encounters.

Work Area. Just inside the quarry lurk five @UUID[Actor.aifZombie0000000]{Zombies}, two @UUID[Actor.aifGhoul00000000]{Ghouls}, and a @UUID[Actor.aifGhast00000000]{Ghast}. Once laborers here, they were corrupted by the stone but continue to swing picks and drive shovels in pointless labor. They fight anyone who disturbs them.

Ambush. Sarbrindar, a @UUID[Actor.aifWight00000000]{Wight} clad in robes decorated with Orcus’s symbol, hides behind a wagon to ambush the party. He’s accompanied by two @UUID[Actor.aifSkeleton00000]{Skeletons} of former workers. The skeletons fight from high ground. Sarbrindar singles out one character for mockery and insults, gleefully fighting until destroyed. Brother Trasig’s broken body is partially buried behind nearby crates, clutching a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgPeriaptOfHeal]{Periapt of Health}. The cause of the transformations is concealed behind an illusory wall. If the illusion is touched, it vanishes.

Hidden Cavity. Within the hidden cavity, the cult has hidden a relic called the Tenebrous Stone. As the characters enter, each is subjected to a vision of a past failure. Roleplay through each of these scenes, inviting players to describe the failure and what their character did or didn’t do in the past. A demonic figure appears in each vision, taunting the character. A character who succeeds on a [[/save 15 Wisdom]] saving throw can change the tragic outcome of their vision; a character who fails experiences the tragedy all over again.

When every vision has resolved, the characters return to their senses, and the demonic figure of their visions manifests as a @UUID[Actor.aifSuccubus00000]{Succubus}. The succubus is Vulnerable to all damage from characters who succeeded on the save and changed the outcome of their vision, but characters who failed that save and experienced a tragic outcome again have the &Reference[Frightened] condition instead.

Conclusion. If the succubus is defeated, the Tenebrous Stone loses its power, and the quarry returns to normal over several days.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.q1w5lU1VxF2xP2XR caption=false]

The Treaty of Ostoria.name: The Treaty of Ostoria
The Treaty of Ostoria.description:
A Location (Moonshae Isles) Adventure for

Level 8 Characters

Win the friendship of a fire giant king.

Situation. High King Kendrick wants a formal peace treaty and alliance with Moonshae’s giants. But a Fomorian named Ulrik Fellwhisper is sabotaging the effort.

Hook. The high king chooses the characters as his emissaries, asking them to travel to Oman’s Isle and enter negotiations with Thuven Moltenbeard, the Fire Giant king of Oman’s Isle.

Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至海盗船长下一回合开始。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]（已计入AC）， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMinorIllus]{Minor Illusion}

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBefuddleme]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShatter000]（7 环版本）

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]（触发条件见该法术），使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Jnn25hKp9FEjaHsk.name: Shield
Jnn25hKp9FEjaHsk.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]的伤害。

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础 AC 变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。目标着装护甲则法术提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Befuddlement.name: 摧心术
Befuddlement.description:
你将一个施法距离内你可见的生物的心灵爆破。该目标必须进行一次智力豁免。

若豁免失败，目标受到10d12心灵伤害，并且无法施展法术也无法执行魔法动作。受术生物每过 30 日即可在当日结束时重复进行该豁免，豁免成功则此法术效应终止。此效应也可以被@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{医疗术}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{祈愿术}终止。

若豁免成功，则目标只会受到一半伤害。

materials.value: 一把没有钥匙的钥匙圈

Befuddled.name: 摧心
Befuddled.description: 若豁免失败，目标受到10d12心灵伤害，并且无法施展法术也无法执行魔法动作。受术生物每过 30 日即可在当日结束时重复进行该[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则此法术效应终止。此效应也可以被@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{医疗术}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{祈愿术}终止。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物

Shatter.name: 粉碎音波
Shatter.description:
一阵震耳欲聋的噪音在你指定的施法距离内一点上爆发出来。以该点为中心半径 10 尺球状区域内的所有生物必须要进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点雷鸣伤害；豁免成功受到半数伤害。构装生物进行该豁免时具有劣势。

如果法术的范围内存在不被任何生物着装携带的非魔法物件，则它也要受到该伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmTreeClub000000]] 或 [[/item .mmTrashLob000000]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Tree Club.name: 树棍
Tree Club.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Trash Lob.name: 投掷垃圾
Trash Lob.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。中毒期间，你无法恢复生命值。

Azer Pyromancer.name: 火矮人烈炎术师
Azer Pyromancer.description:
火矮人

Fire Aura.name: 炽焰灵光
Fire Aura.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 结束回合时，除非其陷入失能状态，否则源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=15VgJKVXwYBOFSqJ]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物都受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 散发出半径 10 尺的明亮光照以及额外 10 尺的微光光照。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmFlameBurst0000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplElementali]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]

Elementalism.name: 四象法门
Elementalism.description:
你操控元素，在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。

召气。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一股足以吹动布料，搅动灰尘，使落叶沙沙作响，关闭打开的门和百叶窗的和风。若打开的门或百叶窗被某人或某物顶住，则其不受该效应影响。

召土。 你创造灰尘或沙子组成的薄帷，覆盖在 5 尺方状区域内的表面上，或者你可以在一堆泥土或沙子中使一个单词以你的手写体出现。

召火。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片无害余烬与一股富有色彩和气味的烟。你选择烟的色彩和气味，而余烬可以点燃区域中的蜡烛、火把或油灯。烟的气味会存留 1 分钟。

召水。 你在 5 尺立方范围内创造一片凉爽的，使范围内生物和物件略微潮湿的雾气。或者，你可以在一个打开的容器或表面上创造一杯干净的水，水会在 1 分钟内蒸发。

塑形元素。 你使 1 尺立方区域内的泥土、沙子、火焰、烟尘、雾气或水呈现出一个粗略的形状（如一名生物），持续 1 小时。

Beckon Element.name: 召唤元素
Beckon Element.chatFlavor: 水、火召唤效果持续 1 分钟。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: 一颗蝙蝠粪和硫磺搓成的小球

Hellish Rebuke.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHellishReb]（触发条件见该法术），使用其施法动作的施法属性。

lJ0WsCTDWAMXkc03.name: 炼狱叱喝
lJ0WsCTDWAMXkc03.description:

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description:
30 尺锥状区域内的所有生物必须成功于一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将丢弃其所有持握物，并在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

以此法被恐慌的生物必须在其回合内执行 &Reference[dash] 动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离你，直至其无路可走为止。如果该生物结束其回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有你的空间，则其可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该生物的效应终止。

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description: 在法术持续时间内，你陷入&Reference[frightened apply=false]{恐慌}状态。你必须在回合内执行 &Reference[dash]{疾走}动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离施法者，直至其无路可走为止。如果你结束回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有施法者的空间，则你可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该效应终止。

Pounce.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度一半的距离并发动一次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标为类人且未被[[lookup @name lowercase]]诅咒，承受以下效应。

体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]]。

失败：目标在不知不觉间被诅咒，且一颗史拉蟾微卵被植入其肉体。移除该诅咒将会摧毁这颗卵。

卵会在 [[/r 2d4*10#完成孕育]]{2d4 × 10}天后完成孕育。诞生前 24 小时，被诅咒的目标会感到不适；它的速度减半，并且D20检定具有劣势。这段时期结束后，卵将转变为一条@UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{史拉蟾蝌蚪}，从宿主的体内啮食而出并将其杀死。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Moonshae Isles) Adventure for

Level 8 Characters

Win the friendship of a fire giant king.

Situation. High King Kendrick wants a formal peace treaty and alliance with Moonshae’s giants. But a @UUID[Actor.aifFomorian00000]{Fomorian} named Ulrik Fellwhisper is sabotaging the effort.

Hook. The high king chooses the characters as his emissaries, asking them to travel to Oman’s Isle and enter negotiations with Thuven Moltenbeard, the @UUID[Actor.aifFireGiant0000]{Fire Giant} king of Oman’s Isle.

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.6y9VYruaqcZLhGAy]{The Treaty of Ostoria}

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Trondhelm. The characters land in Trondhelm safely, but four @UUID[Actor.aifOgre000000000]{Ogres} pick a fight. If the characters make a good impression with Trondhelm’s goliath governor, Oakwright (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifNobleProdigy0]{Noble Prodigy}), he arranges a guide to lead the characters to a mine, where Thuren lives.

Ambush! As the characters cross Oman’s Isle, they’re ambushed by three @UUID[Actor.aifHillGiant0000]{Hill Giants} Ulrik hired.

Earning an Audience. A dozen @UUID[Actor.aifFireGiant0000]{Fire Giants} live in the mine. Thuven is Indifferent and won’t see them until they’ve proven themselves in two tests. The first tests martial prowess against an @UUID[Actor.aifAzerPyromance]{Azer Pyromancer}, two @UUID[Actor.aifHellHound0000]{Hell Hounds}, and four @UUID[Actor.aifAzerSentinel0]{Azer Sentinels}. The second tests crafting skill; the king provides 10 days and up to 200 GP of raw materials for the characters to craft one item. At the end of this time, a character presents the creation to Thuven and makes a [[/skill 15 skill=prf/per]] check, earning the king’s respect on a successful check. If the characters made a magic item from the Armor or Weapon category, the check automatically succeeds.

Council with the Giant King. Once the characters earn his respect, Moltenbeard hears their proposal.

A Hunt. Moltenbeard takes the characters hunting. The hunt is disrupted by an @UUID[Actor.aifAdultWhiteDra]{Adult White Dragon} that Ulrik has tricked into trying to kill Moltenbeard; if the king dies, the characters are blamed and the peace effort collapses. If the characters save the king, he becomes Friendly and drafts a reasonable counterproposal for the high king.

When All Else Fails. Ulrik abducts Moltenbeard and leaves a forged letter for the characters, insulting the high king and rejecting the alliance. The characters must follow Ulrik into the Underdark. He is a @UUID[Actor.aifFomorian00000]{Fomorian} with three @UUID[Actor.aifRedSlaad00000]{Red Slaad }bodyguards.

Tide of Teeth.name: Tide of Teeth
Tide of Teeth.description:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 3 Characters

Solve a dockside murder.

Situation. Harborhands crew members discovered two stevedore corpses near a dilapidated dock, both chewed as if by sharks though they were safely on the dock. The Harborhands worry about this strange attack, as they should. An imp named Cracklebone is orchestrating covert sahuagin raids from an abandoned ship named the Fearsome Grimace.

Hook. The proud human leader of the Harborhands crew, Cadmin Marniok (Medium, Lawful Neutral Tough Boss), hires the characters to investigate Narrowlady Dock, where the bodies were found.

Shark Telepathy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 能使用一种特殊的心灵感应，魔法性地控制其 120 尺内的鲨鱼。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击。

Aquatic Charge.name: 水下冲锋
Aquatic Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线游动至多等于其游泳速度的距离。

Swarm of Lemures.name: 劣魔集群
Swarm of Lemures.description:
劣魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.StGSoy9GntE0mCiY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

劣魔集群

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.2uQgVLQGiUio5qo8 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Hellish Restoration.name: 地狱复苏
Hellish Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 于九层地狱中死去，除非其是被一名处于@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]效应下的生物杀死或是其尸体被泼洒了圣水，否则其将在 [[/r 1d10]] 天后以满生命值复活。

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: 劣魔集群可以进驻另一生物身处的空间，反之亦然。而且劣魔集群可以通过任何足够一名中型生物通过的通道。劣魔集群不能恢复生命值也不能获得临时生命值 。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmVileSlime00000]] 攻击。

Vile Slime.name: 肮脏软泥
Vile Slime.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若[[lookup @activation.condition activity=20pphWmNDQZRzF69]]则改为[[/damage average activity=20pphWmNDQZRzF69]]。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]在对抗法术和其他魔法效应的豁免检定中具有优势。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术} 于自身，无需法术成分并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.name: 隐形术
BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 变形成一只老鼠（速度 20 尺）、一只渡鸦（速度 20 尺，飞行速度 60 尺）、一只蜘蛛（速度 20 尺，攀爬速度 20 尺），或者变回其真实形态。除速度外，其各形态下的数据皆相同。它携带或着装的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Sahuagin Priest.description:
鲨华鱼人

鲨华祭司

Blood Frenzy.name: 血腥狂怒
Blood Frenzy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对生命值未满的生物进行攻击检定时具有优势。

Limited Amphibiousness.name: 有限两栖
Limited Amphibiousness.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在空气和水中呼吸，但必须至少每 4 小时浸入水中一次，以避免离开水后窒息。

Shark Telepathy.name: 鲨心感应
Shark Telepathy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 能使用一种特殊的心灵感应，魔法性地控制其 120 尺内的鲨鱼。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次[[/item .mmSpectralJaws00]] 攻击。

Spectral Jaws.name: 灵体鲨颚
Spectral Jaws.description: 近战或远程攻击检定：[[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]] 尺。命中： [[/damage average]]伤害。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]]施展以下一道法术，无需任何材料成分并使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]

每项2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]，

Fiendish Aid.name: 邪魔支援
Fiendish Aid.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Tongues.name: 巧言术
Tongues.description: 此法术赋予你触碰的一名生物理解任何其能看见或听见的口语或手语的能力。此外，当目标生物以口语或手语进行交流时，任何能听见其话语或看见其手语，且知道至少一门语言的生物都能理解它。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Baldur's Gate) Adventure for

Level 3 Characters

Solve a dockside murder.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.dmgShip000000000]{Ship}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.BWu8ATw6lu8NMZq1]{Tide of Teeth}

Situation. Harborhands crew members discovered two stevedore corpses near a dilapidated dock, both chewed as if by sharks though they were safely on the dock. The Harborhands worry about this strange attack, as they should. An imp named Cracklebone is orchestrating covert sahuagin raids from an abandoned ship named the Fearsome Grimace.

Hook. The proud human leader of the Harborhands crew, Cadmin Marniok (Medium, Lawful Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifToughBoss0000]{Tough Boss}), hires the characters to investigate Narrowlady Dock, where the bodies were found.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Narrowlady Dock. Two Indifferent dwarf Flaming Fist members (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifGuard00000000]{Guards}) keep everyone away from Narrowlady Dock with assurances that the Flaming Fist is “solving the problem.” This is a lie; the guards rolled the corpses off the dock and are hanging around until they can report back that they found no clues. A character can take an Influence action and convince the pair to leave with a successful [[/check Deception Intimidation Persuasion 10 format=long]] or buy them off for 10 GP. The guards also leave if the characters try to start a fight, grumbling, “I hope you get the trouble you’re so eager to find.”

Dock Clues. Blood spatters cover the area where the stevedores were killed, and blood trails lead over the side of the dock. The only ship near the site is an unseaworthy vessel called the Fearsome Grimace. The ship has sunk up to its gunwales in Gray Harbor, and it’s afloat only because it’s lashed to Narrowlady Dock. A character who takes a &Reference[Study] action and succeeds on a [[/check Investigation 12 format=long]] realizes that the corpses were recently rolled over the side of the dock by the Flaming Fist. A character who takes a &Reference[Search] action and succeeds on a [[/check Perception Survival 12 format=long]] identifies tracks of the killers—the splayed, scaled feet of sahuagin.

In the River. Two @UUID[Actor.aifHunterShark00]{Hunter Sharks} have eaten the dead stevedores. They try to eat anyone in the water.

The Fearsome Grimace. Use the @UUID[Scene.dmgShip000000000]{Ship} map in appendix B of the Dungeon Master’s Guide for the derelict ship. The exterior water level is 5 feet higher than depicted on the map, and the thick wooden gangplank descends from Narrowlady Dock to the main deck.

Main Deck. The ship’s dilapidated condition is evident on its main deck, where rotted rigging barely clings to the masts and tattered sails hang like forlorn laundry. A thin cord across the end of the gangplank connects to the rigging, which functions as a falling net trap. In addition, the large hatch over the main hold breaks if a creature moves onto it, like a hidden pit trap, except that the fall into the partially flooded hold doesn’t deal damage. See chapter 3 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide for both traps.

Forecastle. The elevated front of the ship bears an enormous windlass used to haul up an anchor, but the chain dangles limply over the side. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgPoleOfAngling]{Pole of Angling} is jammed into the windlass. Manipulating the windlass or its chain stirs up four @UUID[Actor.aifLacedonGhoul0]{Lacedon Ghouls} that are under the ship; the ghouls climb the exterior of the ship to fight the characters.

Sterncastle. The ship’s elevated stern has mounts for two ballistae. The ballistae look to be in excellent condition apart from several white seagull feathers adhered to each. Both ballistas are in fact @UUID[Actor.aifMimic00000000]{Mimics} that like to eat seabirds.

Hold. The rotted, mold-crusted hold is flooded 2 feet deep with river water and is &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for creatures that lack a Swim Speed. Six @UUID[Actor.aifReefShark0000]{Reef Sharks} lurk under the overturned jolly boats, awaiting prey or sahuagin orders.

Forward Cabin. Water in this cabin, where the sailors once bunked, is ankle deep and thick with blood. Two @UUID[Actor.aifSahuaginWarri]{Sahuagin Warriors} and a @UUID[Actor.aifSwarmOfLemure]{Swarm of Lemures} are messily devouring an enormous eel. If the characters descend from the main deck, one warrior flees to warn Cracklebone, then it makes a stand with the sharks in the hold. An old hammock holds a pouch with [[/award 75gp]] and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPotionofHea]{Potion of Healing}.

Aft Cabin. The finery of this captain’s cabin has long ago turned to rot. Cracklebone the @UUID[Actor.aifImp0000000000]{Imp} is here with a loyal @UUID[Actor.aifSahuaginPries]{Sahuagin Priest}. They immediately initiate combat with intruders but retreat to the hold for reinforcements if outmatched. Tacked to one wall is a tattered map of the docks with plans for several river attacks drawn on it in blood.

Conclusion. If the characters return to Cadmin after exploring the Fearsome Grimace, he gives them [[/award 100gp]] for defeating the sahuagin and another [[/award 100gp]] for Cracklebone’s map.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.w8wbxlHmPFtb9XzZ caption=false]

What Wakes Below.name: What Wakes Below
What Wakes Below.description:
A Location (Icewind Dale) Adventure for

Level 9 Characters

Escape a deep dragon through the Underdark.

Situation. Seer Echomorne (who is secretly the Adult Deep Dragon Mornethraxys) found a beholder frozen below Termalaine and intends to use the creature to cement power in Bryn Shander. She’s been prophesying doom for weeks while keeping the creature’s existence a secret.

Hook. The characters are in Termalaine when the beholder emerges from the mines and begins laying waste to everything and everyone nearby.

Adult Deep Dragon.name: Adult Deep Dragon
Adult Deep Dragon.description:
Dragons of Caverns and Secrets

Deep dragons slither through the wet and lightless places of the Underdark. They are stealthy hunters with an affinity for lost lore and fungi that flourish in the depths. As deep dragons age, their smooth, serpentine bodies become riddled with fungal rot, particularly around their faces, to imbue their breath with terror-inducing spores.

Deep dragons covet treasure and knowledge. Some deep dragons seek to gain knowledge via experience and travel, slithering through caverns and seas of the Underdark to map hidden passages for dozens of miles. Other deep dragons enjoy cultivating groves of molds and fungi, including colossal varieties sufficient to conceal the dragons’ sinuous forms. Many deep dragons collect forgotten tomes or works of art and bully, cajole, or steal collections from drow or duergar sages.

Deep dragons are excellent swimmers. They often clash with aquatic Underdark societies, such as kuo-toa. Many deep dragons demand tribute from these groups in the form of food or treasure.

Underdark explorers have many reasons to brave deep dragon lairs beyond treasure hunting; they might contain the only surviving copies of forgotten lore, fungal ingredients for cures or plagues, or maps to lost Underdark locales.

Adult Deep Dragon

The strange magic pervading the Underdark twists deep dragons as they grow, so few adult deep dragons look alike. Their skin is usually pitted by fungal growths that spread across the body. Although lacking the versatile shape-shifting of metallic dragons, deep dragons can assume the form of animals or humanoids and often masquerade as snakes or dragonborn.

Adult deep dragons eliminate challengers with ferocious might, cunning ambushes, or fungal poisons. Some adult deep dragons plunder the surface for treasures and lore.

Deep Dragon Lairs

Deep dragons lair in fungus-encrusted caverns of the Underdark or old, forgotten ruins, preferring locations near subterranean bodies of water.

The region containing an adult or ancient deep dragon’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Preservation of Knowledge. Books and other written forms of communication with 1 mile of the lair become magically protected and can’t be damaged by nonmagical means.

Restless Sleep. When a creature finishes a Long Rest within 1 mile of the lair, the creature makes a [[/save con 10 format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature doesn’t reduce its Exhaustion level as a result of finishing that Long Rest. Creatures with Immunity to the Poisoned condition are immune to this effect.

Verdant Growth. Vegetation and fungi within 1 mile of the dragon’s lair grow faster and cover a greater area than normal. Foraging in this area yields twice the usual amount of food. The dragon is immediately aware of the presence of any creature that eats this enhanced vegetation.

If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three [[/item Rend]] attacks.

Nightmare Breath.name: Nightmare Breath
Nightmare Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=vVPiTHfiuiycKTjP]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=vVPiTHfiuiycKTjP]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the dragon’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the dragon’s next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description:
Legendary Action Uses: 3 (4 in Lair).

Immediately after another creature’s turn, the dragon can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The dragon regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Pounce.name: 扑杀
Pounce.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

Spore Salvo.name: Spore Salvo
Spore Salvo.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jP2c2t3C9WO92qMi]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=jP2c2t3C9WO92qMi]] feet of the dragon that it can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Failure or Success: The dragon can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The dragon shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Small or Medium Beast, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Beholder.name: 眼魔
Beholder.description:
眼魔

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ROov3E2qOiEfjDXM caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

眼魔巢穴

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.KR7cEJQa2N3FpOsS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmEyeRays0000000]]。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Antimagic Cone.name: 反魔法锥域
Antimagic Cone.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]的主眼向 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] 尺锥状区域内发出一道反魔法能量波。此区域内如同 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF]，且此区域同样反制 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 自己的眼波射线，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

Chomp.name: 切齿
Chomp.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击。

Eye Rays.name: 眼波射线
Eye Rays.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]] 向一名位于其 120 尺内的其可见的目标从下列魔法射线中随机射出一道（掷[[/r 1d10]]，如果 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 在本回合已经使用过该射线则重新掷骰）：

眼波射线

1：魅惑射线。

感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]]伤害，目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态持续 [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] 小时或在其受到伤害时提前结束。

成功： 仅半伤。

2：麻痹射线。

体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]]。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，并在其回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。[[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] 分钟后，其豁免自动成功。

3：恐惧射线。

感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]]伤害，目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

成功： 仅半伤。

4：缓慢射线。

体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]]伤害。直至目标的下个回合结束，目标速度减半，无法执行&Reference[Reaction]{反应}，且目标在其回合中仅可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能同时执行二者。

成功： 仅半伤。

5：汲能射线。

体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]]伤害，目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至其下个回合结束。在中毒期间，目标无法恢复生命值。

成功： 仅半伤。

6：念力射线。

力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]]（如果目标的体型为超巨型则豁免自动成功）。

失败： [[lookup @name lowcase]] 将目标向任意方向移动至多 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] 尺。目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下个回合开始，或在 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 陷入失能状态时提前结束。 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 还可以利用此射线对物件进行精细控制，例如操作工具、打开一扇门或打开容器。

7：睡眠射线。

感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]]（此豁免超巨型自动成功）。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态，持续 [[lookup @duration.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] 分钟。若目标受到伤害或一名目标 5 尺内的生物以一个动作唤醒其，则状态结束。

8：石化射线。

体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q67AgIfRplRO2e9p]]。 首次失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态，在其下个回合结束时目标若仍处于束缚则重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。 再次失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Petrified apply=false] 状态取代其束缚状态。

9：解离射线。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]伤害。若目标是一件非魔法物件或魔法力场造物，则其上一处 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] 尺立方区域内的部分被解离为尘埃。

成功： 半伤。

失败或成功： 若目标是一个生物且此伤害使其生命值降至 0，则该生物被解离为尘埃。

10：死亡射线。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]]。

失败： [[/damage average activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

成功或失败： 如果射线将目标的生命值降至 0，目标死亡。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态持续 1 小时或直到你承受伤害。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，并在你的回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止自身上的该效应。1 分钟后，豁免自动成功。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。中毒期间，你无法恢复生命值。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态 1 分钟。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 首次失败： 你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态并在回合结束时重复此豁免。

K1dTJYj98PUwPBTZ.name: 束缚
K1dTJYj98PUwPBTZ.description: 首次失败： 你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，在你下一回合结束时你若仍处于束缚则重复豁免，成功则终止你身上的该效应。

Petrified.name: 石化
Petrified.description: 再次失败： 你陷入 &Reference[Petrified apply=false] 状态取代束缚状态。

Half Speed/No Reactions.name: 速度减半并无法反应
Half Speed/No Reactions.description: 直至你的下一回合结束，你的速度减半，无法执行&Reference[Reaction]{反应}，且你在自身的回合内只能执行一个动作或一个&Reference[BonusAction]{附赠动作}，但不能同时执行二者。

Half Speed/No Reactions (Copy).name: 请删除
Half Speed/No Reactions (Copy).description: 直至你的下一回合结束，你的速度减半，无法执行&Reference[Reaction]{反应}，且你在自身的回合内只能执行一个动作或一个&Reference[BonusAction]{附赠动作}，但不能同时执行二者。

Haunting Revenant.name: 还魂巨构
Haunting Revenant.description:
还魂鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.MIgxduVUrgHmADPd caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

还魂巨构

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.NalhxqwOlHZ5t2u7 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Haunted Zone.name: 缠魂之地
Haunted Zone.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xmF8v1o2HyVyepb6]]，在 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的空间中施展法术的所有生物。

失败：该法术失败并被浪费。

Undead Restoration.name: 不死再造
Undead Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡，它会在 24 小时内复生，死亡，除非对其遗留物施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]，否则其在 24 小时后复生。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 复生后会活化同一存在位面中的另一个超巨型物件或建筑；这会改变其外形，但不会改变其游戏数据，且归来时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有全部生命值。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmObjectSlam0000]] 攻击并使用 [[/item .mmInvitation0000]]。

Object Slam.name: 物件猛袭
Object Slam.description: 近战或远程攻击检定： [[/attack]]（若目标位于 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所处的空间内则具有优势），触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] 尺。命中：[[/damage average]]伤害。

Invitation.name: 请君入瓮
Invitation.description:
魅力豁免检定： DC 17，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败： 目标被传送至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所在的空间内并被吞下。被吞下的生物对 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 体外的攻击或其他效应而言处于全身掩护。

只要 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 仍具有生命值，被吞下的生物就不能离开还魂巨构所在的空间，除非其使用能够在位面之间旅行的魔法，例如法术位面转移。

Total Cover.name: 全身掩护
Total Cover.description: 你对还魂巨构体外的攻击或其他效应而言处于全身掩护。

Ancient Deep Dragon.name: Ancient Deep Dragon
Ancient Deep Dragon.description:
Deep Dragon Lairs

Deep dragons lair in fungus-encrusted caverns of the Underdark or old, forgotten ruins, preferring locations near subterranean bodies of water.

The region containing an adult or ancient deep dragon’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Preservation of Knowledge. Books and other written forms of communication with 1 mile of the lair become magically protected and can’t be damaged by nonmagical means.

Restless Sleep. When a creature finishes a Long Rest within 1 mile of the lair, the creature makes a [[/save con 10 format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature doesn’t reduce its Exhaustion level as a result of finishing that Long Rest. Creatures with Immunity to the Poisoned condition are immune to this effect.

Verdant Growth. Vegetation and fungi within 1 mile of the dragon’s lair grow faster and cover a greater area than normal. Foraging in this area yields twice the usual amount of food. The dragon is immediately aware of the presence of any creature that eats this enhanced vegetation.

If the dragon dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three [[/item Rend]] attacks.

Nightmare Breath.name: Nightmare Breath
Nightmare Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rQaVvnKj8M4SA05A]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rQaVvnKj8M4SA05A]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the dragon’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the dragon’s next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description:
Legendary Action Uses: 3 (4 in Lair).

Immediately after another creature’s turn, the dragon can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The dragon regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Pounce.name: 扑杀
Pounce.description: The dragon moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

Spore Salvo.name: Spore Salvo
Spore Salvo.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Rgw7pKnnGrBKiLTs]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=Rgw7pKnnGrBKiLTs]] feet of the dragon that it can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Failure or Success: The dragon can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: The dragon shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid or a Small or Medium Beast, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Corrosive Form.name: 腐蚀形态
Corrosive Form.description:
生物以近战攻击检定命中 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 时，其受到 [[/damage average]]伤害。非魔法弹药在命中 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 并造成任意伤害后将立刻被摧毁。任何非魔法武器在对 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 造成伤害并与其接触后将积累 -1 的攻击检定减值。当此减值累计达到 -5 时该武器将被摧毁。对武器施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]可以移除这一减值。

在 1 分钟时间里，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以吃穿 2 尺厚度的非魔法金属或木材。

Foundry Note

该特性提供了一个攻击减值主动效应，会改变选定的武器。由于这种减值可多次施加于多个非魔法武器上，所以此主动效应需要从该物品的“效应”选项卡拖放到目标物品的武器上。

Damaged: -1 Attack.name: 伤害：攻击检定 -1
Damaged: -1 Attack.description: 任意非魔法武器在接触到黑布丁并造成伤害到后将积累 -1 的攻击检定减值。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Split.name: 分裂
Split.description: 触发：若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 体型为大型或中型且具有 10+ 生命值，当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 进入浴血或是其将受闪电伤害或挥砍伤害时。响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 分裂为两块全新的 [[lookup @name capitalize]]。每块新的 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的体型都比原先的 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 小一级，且使用原 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的先攻行动。原 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 生命值将平均分配给新的 [[lookup @name lowercase]] （向下取整）。

Split.name: 分裂
Split.condition: 为大型或中型，且具有 10+ 生命值，当布丁进入浴血状况，或当它即将受闪电伤害或挥砍伤害影响时。

Dissolving Pseudopod.name: 消化伪肢
Dissolving Pseudopod.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。且目标身上穿着的非魔法护甲提供的AC将承受 -1 的减值。当护甲的AC被减值降至 10 时该护甲将被摧毁。对护甲施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000] 可以移除这一减值。

Damaged: -1 AC.name: 伤害：AC -1
Damaged: -1 AC.description: 你着装的非魔法护甲提供的AC将承受 -1 的减值。若护甲的AC因减值降至 10 则其被摧毁。

Grick Ancient.name: 远古穴居攫怪
Grick Ancient.description:
穴居攫怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ZipqOolotovtuLdW caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

远古穴居攫怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.KHQHO2JXfXoBmHxq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmBeak0000000000]] 攻击，一次 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] 攻击，和一次 [[/item .mmTentacles00000]] 攻击。

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物的体型不超过中型，则其被全部四条触须擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 12， [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。且寇涛驱策者无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Location (Icewind Dale) Adventure for

Level 9 Characters

Escape a deep dragon through the Underdark.

Scene: @UUID[Scene.aifUnderdarkTunn]{Underdark Tunnels}

Situation. Seer Echomorne (who is secretly the @UUID[Actor.aifAdultDeepDrag]{Adult Deep Dragon} Mornethraxys) found a beholder frozen below @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifTentownsGazet.JournalEntryPage.UDAfroDI54OORaVX]{Termalaine} and intends to use the creature to cement power in @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifTentownsGazet.JournalEntryPage.p3X5cvOBlHMvlr0y]{Bryn Shander}. She’s been prophesying doom for weeks while keeping the creature’s existence a secret.

Hook. The characters are in Termalaine when the beholder emerges from the mines and begins laying waste to everything and everyone nearby.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Terror in Termalaine. A disoriented, half-frozen @UUID[Actor.aifBeholder00000]{Beholder} assaults Termalaine.

Prophetic Dreams. After the attack, Echomorne’s supporters demand a vote to elect her speaker of Bryn Shander, saying she foresaw the disaster.

Mornethraxys Strikes. Echomorne identifies the party as a threat to her plans and resolves to bring them to her family. Reverting to her dragon shape, she chases them into a tunnel leading to the Underdark.

Giant Ruins. Mornethraxys chases or guides the characters through ruins in the Underdark, through a hall of fallen giants (@UUID[Actor.aifHauntingReven]{Haunting Revenant}), to a cavernous, ruined throne room.

Throne Room. Here, the characters eventually come face to face with Mornethraxys, her father Enderbalathal the Lord Below (@UUID[Actor.aifAncientDeepDr]{Ancient Deep Dragon}), and her brother Guvaali of the Grand Appetite (@UUID[Actor.aifAdultDeepDrag]{Adult Deep Dragon}), who interrogate the party for lore and secrets. When the characters are of no more use, the dragons hurl them down into an ooze swamp.

Ooze Swamp. In a dim and noxious swamp, the characters fight four @UUID[Actor.aifBlackPudding0]{Black Puddings} while searching for an escape. Meanwhile, gluttonous Guvaali decides to hunt them in the fog-filled swamp.

Frozen Horror. The only way out of the swamp is to climb a melting subterranean glacier to a distant steam vent. If the characters light a fire or shine a bright light, they discover true horror: the ice is full of aberrations frozen in a contorted mass, their tendrils reaching upward. Unless the thaw stops, these monsters will surely bring an eldritch apocalypse to Icewind Dale.

Near the Surface. The characters encounter three @UUID[Actor.aifGrickAncient0]{Grick Ancients}, as well as clusters of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7#fireball-fungus]{fireball fungus} (see chapter 3 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide) as they clamber back to the surface. When they emerge from the steam vent, they are at Highplume Station.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.book.JournalEntry.aifAtlas00000000.JournalEntryPage.SPgYDaX3nxVYRChI caption=false]

Wolves of Amphail.name: Wolves of Amphail
Wolves of Amphail.description:
A Faction (Lords' Alliance) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Solve a bestial murder.

Situation. Predator attacks have hit several ranches in Amphail. Unusual beasts have been spotted nearby. The Oglyntyr family, secretly lycanthropes and worshipers of Malar, are responsible.

Hook. Lord Warder Dauner Ilzimmer (Medium, Lawful Neutral Noble) sends for aid from other member cities in the Lords’ Alliance. He offers 150 GP per person to investigators, half in advance.

Noble.name: 贵族
Noble.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmBreastplat]{Breastplate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepRapier0000]{Rapier}

Nobles

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.TVskfAu471arcBTq caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Noble

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.mZUN05Y3B77gCkk6 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]飞行离开敌人的触及范围时不会引发&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]{借机攻击}。

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若类人目标因此伤害生命值降至0，[[lookup @name lowercase]]掏出目标的心脏来杀死目标。

Gore.name: 顶撞
Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。若[[lookup @name lowercase]]在此次攻击前立即向着目标直线移动了 30+ 尺，则目标额外受到9（2d8）穿刺伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmGore0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmTalons00000000]] 攻击。

Commoner.name: 平民
Commoner.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepClub000000]{Club}

Commoner

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.M7bvUVFcncRjraJP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Training.name: 技艺受训
Training.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有某项技能熟练（由DM选择），且在进行使用该技能的属性检定时具有优势。

Scout.name: 斥候
Scout.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{Longbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepShortsword]{Shortsword}

Scouts

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Ia0dhEMIJJ7PVLVn caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Scout

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.AXb6rgRnpN7qGWWX caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jdOlqVzYs89JuqTB]] 和 [[/item .qhM3PIWgXdyRCeul]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmScratch0000000]]{抓挠} 或 [[/item .mYM6o8kM9SDVm45w]]{长弓}发动共计两次攻击。其可以将其中一次攻击替换为一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{啃咬} 攻击。

Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only).name: 啃咬（仅狼与混合形态）
Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only).description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GBKhdBPogHNssDIa]].

Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.aifWerewolf00000]{Werewolf} under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s curse for 24 hours.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 若豁免检定失败，则你被 &Reference[cursed apply=false]。

Details.name: Details
Details.text:
A Faction (Lords' Alliance) Adventure for

Level 4 Characters

Solve a bestial murder.

Scenes: @UUID[Scene.dmgManor00000000]{Manor}, @UUID[Scene.dmgSpookyHouse00]{Spooky House}

Adventure (Import to Run): @UUID[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.adventures.Adventure.FtmfTKJf5PAi1AaK]{Wolves of Amphail}

Situation. Predator attacks have hit several ranches in Amphail. Unusual beasts have been spotted nearby. The Oglyntyr family, secretly lycanthropes and worshipers of Malar, are responsible.

Hook. Lord Warder Dauner Ilzimmer (Medium, Lawful Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifNoble00000000]{Noble}) sends for aid from other member cities in the Lords’ Alliance. He offers [[/award 150GP]] per person to investigators, half in advance.

Encounters

The adventure consists of these encounters.

Road Killers. Near Amphail, in the foothills of the Sword Mountain along the Long Road, three @UUID[Actor.aifPeryton000000]{Perytons} swoop down on the characters. The perytons hint at Malar’s involvement in this mystery.

Amphail Arrival. Lord Ilzimmer greets the party and hosts them in his Stone Stallion inn. He tells the party that he doesn’t want to choose sides, but the deep-rooted Oglyntyr family blames newcomers the Hemzars, who train dangerous creatures—Strem Hemzar recently slew an owlbear on Hemzar Ranch. But Riven Oglyntyr, who left decades ago to adventure, returned not long ago and could be involved. He needs an outside party to investigate.

Hemzar Ranch. When the party visits Hemzar Ranch, 7 miles west of Amphail, use the @UUID[Scene.dmgManor00000000]{Manor map} if needed. The Hemzars, all humans, largely cooperate with the investigation and instruct their four servants and ranch hands to do the same.

Hemzars

Name

Traits

Elyann

Quiet, wise herbalist; Strem’s wife (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifCommoner00000]{Commoner})

Kalia

Witty, driven trainer and daughter (Medium, Lawful Good @UUID[Actor.aifScout00000000]{Scout})

Strem

Flighty, loyal trainer and son (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifWerewolf00000]{Werewolf})

Taero

Proud, practical father and patriarch (Medium, Lawful Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifNoble00000000]{Noble})

Vonda

Warm, sharp treasurer and matriarch (Medium, Neutral Good @UUID[Actor.aifNoble00000000]{Noble})

Strem slew a bloody owlbear a few weeks ago and has been ill ever since. The owlbear was sent by Malar, who cursed Strem to be a werewolf. He convalesces in the manor tower, and he and his family chain him up there at night, keeping the truth of his condition a secret.

The Hemzars assume Strem contracted lycanthropy from the owlbear. A character who takes a &Reference[Study] action and succeeds on a [[/skill 15 rel]] check recalls Malar sends blood-covered beasts out into the world, and he takes umbrage when they’re slain. Searching the Hemzar manor turns up an ivory idol of Malar in one of the barns, but the Hemzars don’t know where it came from.

Oglyntyr Ranch. Eight miles north of Amphail, Oglyntyr Ranch shows signs of neglect. Use the @UUID[Scene.dmgSpookyHouse00]{Spooky House} map if needed. The Oglyntyr basement houses a gory Malar shrine decorated with human heads and an owlbear skull.

The Oglyntyrs, all humans, have a nasty reputation. Riven became a lycanthrope while away on adventure and has brought Malar’s worship back to his family, all of whom are now cursed.

Oglyntyrs

Name

Traits

Dorn

Ruthless, sly trainer and patriarch (Medium @UUID[Actor.aifWereboar00000]{Wereboar})

Jhess

Affable, wayward trainer and son (Medium, Chaotic Neutral @UUID[Actor.aifWererat000000]{Wererat})

Mirin

Calm, cruel healer and matriarch (Medium, Neutral Evil @UUID[Actor.aifWerewolf00000]{Werewolf})

Riven

Ambitious, greedy uncle (Medium, Chaotic Evil @UUID[Actor.aifWeretiger0000]{Weretiger})

The family’s four remaining servants are @UUID[Actor.aifWererat000000]{Wererats}.

Sacred Hunt. When the party begins investigating the Oglyntyrs, the family pretends to cooperate and blames the Hemzars. But as the party discovers the shrine or otherwise gets close to the truth, the Oglyntyrs decide to kill the party and honor Malar by making them the object of a hunt. The family stalks the characters and harries them in the wilderness.

Use the following encounters, giving the party time to recover between each.

  • Dorn alongside Mirin.
  • Jhess and two servants. If Bloodied, these lycanthropes flee back to the ranch or surrender.
  • Riven, one servant, and one @UUID[Actor.aifPanther000000]{Panther}. If &Reference[Bloodied], the servant flees or surrenders, but Riven makes sure the cowardly servant dies.

Conclusion. Lord Ilzimmer is displeased if the Oglyntyrs come to harm, but if confronted with the evidence, he admits the family was likely responsible. Strem Hemzar’s hidden lycanthropy can prompt further adventure. Each character’s Renown Score with the Lords’ Alliance increases by 1.
